body: [VW PACKET, REWRITE, RISE & OLD] 🌟 [Killaura] ⚔️ - ❌ Removed Charge Ratio + ✅ Added OneTap Cooldown for higher damage per hit + 🛠️ Fixed LegitAura not properly working [AimAssist] 🎯 + 🛠️ Fixed not working when ClickAim is enabled [Nuker] 💣 + 🛠️ Fixed functionality for reliable block breaking [AutoClicker] 🖱️ + 🛠️ Fixed automatic clicking for swords and blocks [TriggerBot] 🔫 + 🛠️ Fixed trigger mechanics for accurate activation [AutoVoidDrop & Other Modules] 🌌 + 🛠️ Fixed improper match state handling to prevent yielding [AutoBuy] 🛒 + 🛠️ Fixed purchasing logic for consistent operation
title: Module Fixes & OneTap Cooldown! 🚀

body: [VW PACKET, REWRITE, RISE & OLD] 🌟 + ✅ Fixed Inventory issues + ✅ Fixed Killaura functionality + ⚡ Optimized Killaura target finding (improved performance by fixing training room dummies check) + 🛠️ Fixed lagging issues caused by UI Cleanup (temporarily removed for this emergency update) + ✅ Fixed AdetundeExploit attempting upgrades without a sword - ❌ Removed UI Cleanup (until fixed) - ❌ Removed Interface (until fixed) - ❌ Removed HitFix (until fixed)
title: Emergency Fixes & Optimizations 🛠️

body: [CustomChat] - NEW! 🌟 + ⭐ Customise your chat for even better experience + ✨ Added CustomChat module which lets you customise your chat into your very own one :D + 🛠️ Added fixes to the chat tags (clan tags, etc.) not appearing when executing VW Toggles: + ✅ Display Kills + ✅ Display Win + ✅ Display Defeat + ✅ Display Bed break + ✅ Typewriter effect [StreamerMode] - NEW! 🌟 + 🎥 Added StreamerMode which will help you when making videos/showcases/etc. by hiding your name, display name and userid (not server sided) [VW PACKET] ⭐ [AutoDodge] + 🛠️ Fixed not working [VW PACKET, RISE, OLD & REWRITE] ⭐ [Nuker] + ⚡ Optimised Nuker to now ignore other blocks if its breaking a bed [Scaffold] + ✨ Added AutoSwitch toggle to automatically switch to the block being placed [Antihit V2] - NEW! 🌟 + 🛡️ Added Antihit V2 (In a few days i'll review what the opinions on the new antihit are and choose if I'll delete the old antihit or not)
title: CustomChat, StreamerMode & Antihit V2! 🌟

body: [VW REWRITE, PACKET, OLD, RISE] + 🛠️ Fixed Nuker functionality for more reliable block breaking + ✨ Added NoClickDelay for instant interactions + 🤝 Added AutoKit for automated kit management [BedProtector] + ✋ Added Hand Check to ensure correct item usage + 🔄 Added AutoSwitch toggle (enabled by default) to automatically switch to the block being placed, bypassing HandCheck + 🛠️ Added customizable BlockTypeCheck toggle (enabled by default) for flexible block type validation [AutoWhisper] + ⚡ Optimized ground check for better performance + 📏 Added Below Map Trigger toggle to activate abilities when below the map + 🎚️ Added Map Threshold slider to fine-tune below-map activation [BlockIn] + 🔄 Added AutoSwitch toggle (enabled by default) to automatically switch to the block being placed, bypassing HandCheck [Projectile Aimbot] + 🛠️ Fixed ProjectileAimbot causing FPS drops on mobile devices + 🛠️ Fixed ProjectileAimbot target visualizer running when not holding a projectile + 👁️ Added TargetVisualiser toggle (enabled by default) for customizable visuals [Cheat Engine Mode - VW REWRITE, OLD, PACKET, RISE] + 🛠️ Fixed Projectiles not working correctly + 🎯 Added ProjectileAura support with highlight visuals for targeted entities
title: Fixes & ProjectileAura Highlights 🚀

body: [VW REWRITE, PACKET, OLD, RISE] + 🌟 Added images to the UpdateLog + 🚀 VW PACKET IS BACK! [VW REWRITE, PACKET] + ⚡ Optimised the nuker A LOT + 🛠️ Fixed Scaffold [WoolOnly] check [VW OLD, RISE] + ✨ Added block breaking gui from VW Rewrite [VW REWRITE, PACKET, OLD, RISE] + ⚡ Optimised AutoWhisper - Thanks groya9633#0 + 🥚 Added /eggclaim chat command to claim the Cheatcode Egg!
title: Images in UpdateLog + Packet Returns! 🌟

body: [VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old] + 🛠️ Fixed Killaura not working properly across multiple scenarios + 🛠️ Fixed DamageIndicator not rendering correctly [VW Rewrite, Old & Rise] + ⚡ Optimized KillEffects and Killaura for smoother performance + 🛠️ Fixed lagging issues on mobile devices when using ProjectileAimbot [VW Rewrite] + 🛡️ Added error handling system to profiles saving for better reliability
title: Quick Hotfixes for Stability! 🛠️

body: [VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old] + 🌟 INTRODUCING: VW UPDATE LOG! Directly integrated into the script + 🔄 Rewrote completely the config installer + ⏳ (soon) Introducing system to share configs with friends and the Voidware community in just a few easy steps! [CORE VOIDWARE FIXES] + 🛠️ Fixed Voidware not loading on Ember Executor + 🛠️ Fixed Voidware not loading on Ronix Executor [VW Old & Rise] + 🛠️ Fixed Lumen, Umeko, Whim ProjectileAura not working + 🤝 Added GinerBreadMan AutoKit support (auto destroys gumdrops) + ✨ Added AutoSuffocate + ✨ Added AutoVoidDrop + 🛠️ Fixed DamageIndicator + 🛠️ Fixed WeatherMods + 🔄 Renamed GameFixer -> HitFix + 🔄 Moved HitFix [Legit -> Combat Category] + 🛠️ Fixed StaffFetcher not working + 🛠️ Fixed QueueCardMods not properly updating the gradient + ✨ Added AutoPearl + 🛠️ Fixed Killaura breaking + 🛠️ Fixed NightmareEmote sometimes breaking [VW Rewrite, Packet] + 🔄 Moved HitFix [Legit -> Combat Category] + 🛠️ Fixed AutoPearl [CE Mode - VW Old, Rise] ⚙️ + 🛠️ Fixed Killaura breaking [CE Mode - VW Rewrite, Packet] ⚙️ + 🛠️ Fixed Sword Animation not working on Killaura when [Swing Only] toggle is enabled [VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old] + 🛠️ Fixed Fly ProgressBar sometimes resulting in fps drops + ✨ Added AutoWhisper - Thanks nonamebetoo#0 for making this + 🛠️ Fixed StaffDetector running into issues + ⚡ Fixed fps drop issues on executing Voidware + ✨ Added [Wool Only] toggle to Scaffold [ProjectileAimbot Enhancements] 🎮 + ⚡ Added Range Slider + ✨ Added Outline creation on targets + 🎯 Added Automatical Target Locking [AutoBuy Updates] 🏪 + ✨ Added Buy Axolotls toggle + 🔥 Added Pyro flamethrower support (will be purchased after emerald sword) [CE Mode - VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old] ⚙️ + ✨ Added AutoSuffocate + ✨ Added AutoVoidDrop + 🛠️ Fixed issues with KitESP + ✨ Added [Wool Only] toggle to Scaffold + 🛠️ Fixed Nuker crashing on failing to break a block + 🌟 Added little visualiser telling you when Nuker is breaking a block
title: VW UPDATE LOG INTEGRATION + FIXES! 🚀

body: [VW Rewrite, Rise, Packet & Old] + 🛡️ Fixed BedProtector using bad blocks for bed defense & improved the "too far" message for better clarity + 🛠️ Fixed BetterDavey not AutoShooting properly & breaking the cannon on shoot + 📱 Added MobileControls to Fly for easier use on touch devices + 🌟 Added Priority TextList to BedProtector to prioritise certain blocks as important layers [VW Rewrite, Packet] + ⏳ Added Fly ProgressBar to Fly for a visual flight timer [CE Mode - VW Rewrite, Packet] ⚙️ + 🛠️ Fixed Fly, LongJump, and Scaffold GUIs not appearing + 🛠️ Fixed Fly TP Down not functioning + ✨ Fixed Performance issues with Ping [VW Packet] + 🛠️ Fixed Fly TP Down not working
title: Some fixes and life optimisations 🌟

body: [Voidware Update Log - VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old Editions] [Core Improvements] 🛠️ + ✨ Added a new system to stop Voidware from loading unnecessary components, greatly improving performance and reducing crashes on low-end devices + 🐛 Fixed the core switch so it now properly shows tool switching + 🛠️ Fixed ShopCheck in AimAssist for better reliability + ✋ Added HandCheck to BlockIn for improved accuracy + 🛠️ Resolved occasional AutoBuy failures + ⏳ Slowed down the core error notification for a smoother experience + 🎯 Added FirstPersonCheck to AimAssist for precision + 🛡️ Added an Error Handler to the GamingChair module for stability + 🤝 Added Hannah AutoKit support (HannahExploit merged into it) - ❌ Removed HannahExploit (now part of AutoKit) + 🌟 Introduced BetterDavey for a slick upgrade + ⚡ BedProtector now has INF Range! + ⚡ BedProtector now has CPS Slider! [Projectile Aimbot Enhancements] 🎮 + ✨ Added Whim and Umeko to projectile aimbot [Projectile Aura Optimizations] 🚀 + ⚡ Optimized Whim, Umeko, and Lumen for top performance + 🛠️ Fixed Wallcheck to work as intended [CE Mode - VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old] ⚙️ + 🎯 Added FirstPersonCheck to AimAssist + 🛠️ Fixed AutoBuy not triggering properly + 🛠️ Fixed NoFall breaking down + 🛠️ Fixed AimAssist glitches + 🛠️ Fixed Killaura in Legit Aura mode + ⚡ Optimized Nuker for faster operation + ⚡ BedProtector now has INF Range! + ⚡ BedProtector now has CPS Slider! + ✨ Added Legit Mode to AutoKit for safer play + 🤝 Added Hannah AutoKit support (HannahExploit merged into it) - ❌ Removed HannahExploit (now part of AutoKit) [VW Rewrite-Specific Updates] 🔧 + 🛠️ Fixed ProfilesSaver so it saves correctly + 🤝 Added Crypt AutoKit support + 🛠️ Fixed NameTags display issues [VW Packet-Specific Updates] 📦 ! 🔄 Renamed "Breaker" to "Nuker" for clarity [VW Rise & Old-Specific Updates] 🕰️ + 🛠️ Fixed BlockIn functionality + 🛠️ Fixed lobby loading failures + 🛠️ Fixed remotes not responding + 🛠️ Fixed Killaura not attacking Marina Jellyfishes + 🛠️ Fixed AutoBuy consistency + 🤝 Added Zeno AutoKit support + 🎯 Improved Killaura MouseDown check - ❌ Removed ScytheExploit (patched) - ❌ Removed AntiLagback (patched) [Code Rewrites - VW Rewrite, Packet, Rise & Old] 💻 + 🔄 Rewrote QueueCardMods for better performance + 🔄 Revamped HackerDetector for sharper detection + ✨ Rewrote StaffDetector into StaffDetector [Enhanced] with new features + 🔄 Rewrote AutoBuyDiamondUpgrades for seamless upgrades + 🔄 Overhauled Invisibility for reliability [VW Rise & Old-Specific Rewrites] 🕰️💻 + 🔄 Rewrote HighlightVisuals for crisper visuals + ✨ Upgraded StaffDetector-Roblox to StaffFetcher-Roblox with enhanced power + 🔄 Revamped DamageIndicator for clearer combat feedback + 🔄 Rewrote WeatherMods for better customization
title: HUGE VOIDWARE UPDATE! 🚀

body: [VW REWRITE & PACKET & OLD & RISE] [---- AUTOKIT UPDATE ----] + ✅ Fixed KALIYAH AutoKit + ✅ Fixed MetalDetector AutoKit + ✅ Fixed ElderTree AutoKit + ✅ Fixed Cobalt AutoKit + ✅ Fixed Zurot AutoKit + ✅ Fixed Eldric AutoKit + ✅ Fixed Hannah AutoKit + ✅ Fixed Miner AutoKit + ➕ Added Kaida Killaura support + 🔄 ReAdded Wallcheck to Killaura + 🎯 Added Testing Dummies in Testing Mode as valid targets + 🛡️ Fixed Panic not disabling Profiles Saving resulting in your Profiles getting lost + 🔄 Fixed BedPlates not auto updating + 🏪 Added ShopCheck to AimAssist + 🔴 Fixed Killaura Range Circle not being created after restarting Killaura + 🛠️ Fixed not being able to build when KA Range Circle is enabled - ❌ Removed DoubleHighJump (patched) [---- ,,Failure fetching remote'' fixes ----] + ✅ Fixed finding WarlockTarget remote + ✅ Fixed finding SpawnRaven remote [---- LAGGING ISSUES FIX ----] + ⚡ Fixed lag issues with Voidware caused by the new switchTool function [---- CORE FIX ----] + 🆕 Added a new system which will prevent Voidware from breaking every time the Bedwars devs rename something 💀 Reconfigured remotes: 15+ [VW OLD & VW RISE] + 🔄 Rewrote AutoBuy [VW OLD & RISE & REWRITE & PACKET] - CE MODE + ✅ Fixed AimAssist + 🧱 Added Wallcheck to AimAssist + 🏪 Added Shop Check to AimAssist [---- AUTOKIT UPDATE ----] + ➕ Added Eldric AutoKit + ➕ Added Zeno AutoKit [VW REWRITE & PACKET] - CE MODE + ✅ Fixed Limit to Items Killaura + ✅ Fixed not loading in Lobby [CONFIG INSTALLER] + 🔧 The installer will now auto uninject Voidware to properly install the profiles
title: A BIG VOIDWARE UPDATE! 🌟
